thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing Hotel - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Giovanni E
title: Amazing Hotel
text: My point of view one of the best Hotel in NYC architecture style service amazing food comfortable rooms with all the amenities, great location near Brooklyn bridge , Wall Street , and freedom tower you really feel the best energy in this amazing hotel, historic building with the best details of the 1800,s. Great job for Thompson's Hotels. You will feel that you travel to the past in all the locations of this lovely hotel.
